verbs.description: definitize (third-person singular simple present definitizes, present participle definitizing, simple past and past participle definitized)

entries.meaning: (transitive, US military) To make (a contract, plan, or the like) definite.
examples: As before, in order to definitize the solution, an initial condition is needed.

entries.meaning: (transitive, grammar) To make definite (of e.g. a noun or adjective) English Wikipedia has an article on:Definiteness (linguistics)Wikipedia
